creator: mattdenney
title: Laser cut Leavers book
description: This project is about personalizing leavers books (or similar hardback books/diaries) using a laser cutter to engrave designs and text onto the cover, making them unique and easily identifiable.
steps: Measure the leavers book cover from the binding to the edge to determine the correct size for the design.
Set up the design space in 2D design software, ensuring the material size matches the cover size and leaving a gap between the edge and the design to avoid cutting into the binding.
Choose personal elements such as name, symbols, school name, and meaningful logos to incorporate into the design for both the front and back covers.

Select a preferred font, preferably with a thin fill, to minimize burning through the cover and reduce cutting time. Ensure all logos and pictures have transparent backgrounds to prevent unwanted cuts.
Use the laser cutter with high speed and low power settings to engrave the design onto the cover. Test the laser strength on a piece of card or a spare leavers book first.
Clean up any residue left on the cover after engraving using a rubber or a very slightly damp cloth, brushing lightly to avoid damaging the engraving.
Get the leavers book signed and keep it as a reminder of memories.
